definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to have lost one's mind/crazy/soft in the head

sentences.english: How do you cope when your brain locks up?
sentences.chinese: 當腦子突然抽住的時候，你會如何解決呢？

sentences.english: You have something on your mind, I think, " said the mattress".
sentences.chinese: “你腦子裏在想些什麼，我覺得，”牀墊慵圈地說。

sentences.english: And most brain-numbing of all, you have expectations about what other people expect of you.
sentences.chinese: 當腦子都麻木了，想想別人對你的預期。

sentences.english: To doff one's hat . Some men's hat is easily blow away as their head.
sentences.chinese: 有些人的帽子，就象他們的腦子一樣，很容易被吹走。

sentences.english: Only humming a little, the quiet sound in the head.
sentences.chinese: 哼哼小曲，腦子裏有一個輕微的聲音。

sentences.english: When I think of summer I think of all the bugs.
sentences.chinese: 一想到夏天，我的腦子裏就想到那些蟲子。

sentences.english: LX: As I said, during that entire time, my mind was blank.
sentences.chinese: 就像剛纔我說的那樣，那時我腦子一片空白。

sentences.english: They had been indoctrinated from an early age with their parents' beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 他們從小就被滿腦子灌入他們父母的信仰。

sentences.english: His name flitted through my mind, only to be forgotten again.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字在我的腦子裏閃過，接着又忘了。
不動腦子，我就活不下去。

sentences.english: His mind was full of ideas which he wanted to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 他腦子裏充滿了他想討論的觀點。

sentences.english: "People thought we were touched in the head, " said Scheuer.
sentences.chinese: “人們認爲我們腦子有問題，”朔伊爾說。

sentences.english: I was actually thinking of Nick.
sentences.chinese: 我實際上腦子裏想的是尼克。

sentences.english: I sat down and my mind 12)triggered off dull thuds of depression.
sentences.chinese: 坐了下來，腦子裏突然充斥着抑鬱的感覺。

sentences.english: B: All she thinks about these days is her new boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 這幾天她滿腦子都在想她的新男朋友。

definition: don't tell me .../could it be that...?
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to indulge in flights of fancy (idiom)/to let one's imagination run wild
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
